titleStmt.title: The devil in his dumps: or A sad complaint of malignant spirits, at the settling of peace and truth in a late conventicle held neer the Tovver for the better influence of Iohn Lilburns counsels. Also a full and true relation of the sectaries desperate conclusions concerning their last and present design for the utter ruine of church and state.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
